msbt.message: I'm trying to stare super-duper hard. I'm not gonna miss a single meteor, no matter how much my eyes hurt.
Any idea how to tell the wish-making stars from the regular ones?
You never know when a meteor's gonna come, so you can NEVER blink My eyes are so dry right now.
For me, gawkin' at a rainbow's like getting a brain scrub.
Get a load of that rainbow! If my flowers had mouths, you know they'd be singin'!
Don't know why, but rainbows make me wanna hop on a motorbike and just ride and ride and ride
A double rainbow's cool, but you know what'd be even cooler? A septuple rainbow!
Two rainbows! It's like a giant, gorgeous sky-sandwich!
Rainbows disappear before you know it, so I'm gonna get a real good stare in while I still can!
Auroras are so wild. They're like the night sky playing slow jazz.
I wonder how much it'd cost to get my curtains to look like that aurora
I'm glad I came out to look at the aurora, but I wish it weren't so cold!
Check out that vapor trail. Wonder where the plane's headed
That plane's vapor trail looks like a brush stroke or something. It's kinda neat, .
Sometimes I get a little homesick when I see an airplane vapor trail
Looking at the full moon totally makes me wanna party!
The moon kinda looks like a great, big motorcycle headlight, doesn't it?
Look at that big sky-pancake! Just needs some butter and some syrup and Maybe I should eat.
